people_also_ask.title: Homeworld 3 - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: Set in space, the science fiction game follows the Kushan exiles of the planet Kharak after their home planet is destroyed by the Taiidan Empire in retaliation for developing hyperspace jump technology. ... Homeworld was created over two years, and was the first game developed by Relic.
people_also_ask.title: Homeworld - Wikipedia

people_also_ask.heading: Control your fleet and build an armada across more than 30 single-player missions. Choose unit types, fleet formations and flight tactics for each strategic situation. Homeworld Remastered Collection is now available for purchase on Steam, GOG.com, and at your local retailer.
